item.title: Extension of Srd Grant and Increase in Child Support and Foster Care Grants
item.description: Stay informed about the recent changes to the SASSA Grants during the 2023 budget speech. Learn about the extension of the SRD grant and increases to Child Support and Foster Care grants. Access to financial information and resources to check SRD status.
